coloredTexts.text: Two days ago I ate a Kangaroo Burger and I'm still not hungry. Can you believe it?
I once tried butchering a Creeper. It didn't go well.
My favorite meat is the one that I butcher myself. Especially the pork.
The delights of the world are waiting for my knives.
Keep those hands clean before you touch any meat.
The butcher always meat your needs hehe. Get it?
